title: Trainer Ball Watch Face
summary: Want to be the very best? Want to catch them all? Download this watch face now!
description: The trainer ball watch face for your Android Wear device; now you can carry your Trainer Ball where ever you go, it even displays an outline of the ball when your watch is on low powered ambient mode.When the watch face is displayed in normal operating mode it moves around (clockwise) as the seconds pass.The trainer ball watch face is nerdy but a stylish watch face with both an analogue and digital option that you can select from right away on your watch. It's perfect for any one who wants to be the very best and wants to catch them all.Looks great on your round Moto 360 or square LG G watch.
descriptionHTML:
The trainer ball watch face for your Android Wear device; now you can carry your Trainer Ball where ever you go, it even displays an outline of the ball when your watch is on low powered ambient mode.

When the watch face is displayed in normal operating mode it moves around (clockwise) as the seconds pass.

The trainer ball watch face is nerdy but a stylish watch face with both an analogue and digital option that you can select from right away on your watch. It's perfect for any one who wants to be the very best and wants to catch them all.

Looks great on your round Moto 360 or square LG G watch.
comments: Awesome LOVE the idea of a spinning Pok√©ball for this - it's simple but looks really neat, and lots of people comment on it. Out of all my downloads I probably use this face the most.
Needs more options but still pretty nice Would love to have the digital clock not be in military time (24hrs) but rather in 12hr
It's too light and i hate it the pokeball going around the clock yuck
recentChanges: - Adds a Digital watch face version
- Uses a new more 3D style background
